channel.title: Text editing (colours)
channel.description: hello what file do i go into to change text in the box were u right click people ... etc, attack, trade with... and so on. also i just wanted to say for some reason i can run my server with people getting on it without using no-ip? thats wierd... thanks!

item.description:
@pk-town wrote:

wrong, go to your sendquest 126 methods and add onto it , if you need a list of the methods ill send to you

Read full topic

item.title: Text editing (colours)
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I will help you.
But please, REMOVE THE IP’S!
WE ALL KNOW WHAT NO-IP IS!
Now, in client.java search for whatever the right-click is.
Ctrl + F = “Attack”.
Now to change the color, put one of these in front of it.
It should look like this:

"@red@Attack"

Make sure its within the " "
And make sure the color is the first 3 characters of its name.
Here are some colors:

@cya@: Cyan
@blu@: Blue
@red@: Red
@pur@: Purple
@bla@: Black

If you want more colors, google it

I hope I helped

Read full topic

item.title: Text editing (colours)
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Remove the IP’s because your advertising.

Text colouring is only available in a client.
